text: Mu'awiya Ould Sid'Ahmed al-Taya (; born November 28, 1943) is a Mauritanian military officer and a politician. He was the President of Mauritania from 1984 to 2005. He was also the 5th Prime Minister of Mauritania from April 1981 to March 1984 and then from December 1984 to April 1992.Themon Djaksam, "Country profile: Mauritania", New Internationalist, October 1997. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Mauritania Category:Presidents of Mauritania
title: Mu'awiya al-Taya
